flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
即使是翻斗车也能轻松举起。
但是手指很笨拙，
所以细微的工作完全不行。

ダンプさえ　軽々　持ち上げる。
ただし　指先は　不器用で
細かい　仕事は　まるで　無理。

It can lift heavy loads with the greatest of ease.
It can even heft dump trucks. But its clumsy
fingers prevent it from doing any precision work.

Può sollevare senza sforzo anche un camion, ma
è piuttosto maldestro nei lavori di precisione.

Puede levantar camiones pesados con gran
facilidad, pero cuando tiene que hacer algún
trabajo más delicado, fracasa estrepitosamente.

Es kann mühelos Kipplaster hochheben. Da es
jedoch Grobmotoriker ist, sollte man ihm keine
Arbeit geben, die Fingerspitzengefühl erfordert.

Il soulève sans effort les plus gros camions à
benne. Mais il n’est pas habile de ses mains,
et est incapable de faire un travail de précision.

即使是大卡車也能輕鬆舉起。
但是手指很笨拙，
所以細微的工作完全不行。

덤프트럭마저 가볍게 들어 올린다.
그러나 손끝은 둔해서
세밀한 작업은 전혀 못 한다.

ダンプさえ　かるがる　もちあげる。
ただし　ゆびさきは　ぶきようで
こまかい　しごとは　まるで　むり。

あらゆる　格闘技を　マスターした　ポケモン。
４本の　腕で　つかまれたら　もう　終り。
地平線の　向こうまで　投げ飛ばされてしまう。

Machamp is known as the Pokémon that has mastered
every kind of martial arts. If it grabs hold of the foe with its
four arms, the battle is all but over. The hapless foe is thrown
far over the horizon.

Machamp è noto per la sua maestria nella pratica di tutte
le arti marziali. Se afferra il nemico con le sue quattro braccia
possenti, la lotta è già decisa. Lo sventurato avversario
verrà infatti scagliato ben oltre l’orizzonte.

Machamp es conocido como el Pokémon que domina todas
las artes marciales. Si agarra a su rival con los cuatro brazos
que tiene, su enemigo no tendrá nada que hacer. El pobre
contrincante saldrá volando hasta perderse en el horizonte.

Machomei wurde berühmt, da es alle Arten der Kampfkunst
beherrscht. Wenn es einen Gegner mit seinen vier Armen
zu fassen gekriegt hat, ist der Kampf so gut wie vorbei.
Es schleudert ihn dann nämlich weit über den Horizont hinaus.

Mackogneur est célèbre, car c’est le seul Pokémon qui
a réussi à maîtriser tous les types d’arts martiaux.
S’il parvient à attraper son ennemi avec ses quatre bras,
il le projette par-delà l’horizon.

모든 격투기를 마스터한 포켓몬이다.
4개의 팔에 잡히면 그대로 끝이다.
지평선 너머까지 집어 던져 버린다.

あらゆる　かくとうぎを　マスターした　ポケモン。
４ほんの　うでで　つかまれたら　もう　おわり。
ちへいせんの　むこうまで　なげとばされてしまう。

なんでも　投げ飛ばす　パワーを　持つが　細かい
作業を　すると　腕が　絡まってしまう。
考える　よりも　先に　体が　動く。

Machamp has the power to hurl anything aside. However,
trying to do any work requiring care and dexterity causes its
arms to get tangled. This Pokémon tends to leap into action
before it thinks.

Machamp è dotato di una forza tale da riuscire a scagliare
lontano ogni cosa. Le sue braccia sono troppo possenti per
riuscire a eseguire qualsiasi lavoro che richieda attenzione
e destrezza. Tende ad agire prima di pensare.

Machamp es tan fuerte que puede derribar lo que quiera.
Sin embargo, cuando tiene que realizar una tarea que
requiere delicadeza y destreza, se le enredan los brazos.
Este Pokémon pasa a la acción sin pensar.

Machomei hat genug Kraft, um alles Mögliche zu stemmen.
Bei Tätigkeiten, die Geschick und Sorgfalt erfordern, machen
es ihm seine Arme jedoch nicht leicht. Dieses Pokémon neigt
dazu, zuerst zu handeln und dann zu denken.

Mackogneur est capable de déplacer n’importe quelle masse.
Cependant, ses bras s’emmêlent dès qu’il essaie de réaliser
un travail délicat ou minutieux. Ce Pokémon a tendance à
cogner d’abord et à réfléchir ensuite.

무엇이든 내던질 수 있는 파워를 지녔으나
세밀한 작업을 하면 팔이 얽히고 만다.
생각하기보다 몸이 먼저 움직인다.

なんでも　なげとばす　パワーを　もつが　こまかい
さぎょうを　すると　うでが　からまってしまう。
かんがえる　よりも　さきに　からだが　うごく。

４本の　腕で　相手の　手足を
押さえこみ　自由を　奪うと
地平線の　向こうまで　投げ飛ばす。

It uses its four powerful arms to pin the limbs of its
foe, then throws the victim over the horizon.

Con le sue quattro potenti braccia afferra gli arti del
nemico per poi lanciarlo lontano.

Usa sus cuatro poderosos brazos para agarrar a su
enemigo y lanzarlo lo más lejos posible.

Es setzt seine vier Arme ein, um die Glieder seiner
Gegner festzuhalten. Dann wirft es sie hinfort.

Il se sert de ses quatre bras pour enserrer les
membres de sa victime puis il la projette au loin.

4개의 팔로 상대방의 손발을
붙잡아 꼼짝 못하게 만들고
지평선 멀리까지 던져버린다.

４ほんのうでで　あいての　てあしを
おさえこみ　じゆうを　うばうと
ちへいせんのむこうまで　なげとばす。

発達した　４本の　腕は
２秒間に　１０００発の　パンチを
繰り出すことができる。

Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch
a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.

Le braccia eccezionalmente sviluppate sono in
grado di assestare 1000 pugni in soli 2 secondi.

Tiene cuatro brazos tan bien desarrollados que puede
dar una serie de 1000 puñetazos en cuestión de dos
segundos.

Seine markigen Arme können innerhalb von nur
zwei Sekunden 1 000 Schläge verteilen.

Ses deux paires de bras permettent à Mackogneur
d’envoyer une série de 1 000 coups de poing en 2 s.

발달한 4개의 팔은
2초 동안 1000번의
펀치를 날릴 수 있다.

はったつした　４ほんの　うでは
２びょうかんに　１０００ぱつの
パンチを　くりだすことができる。

Its four muscled arms slam foes
with powerful punches and chops
at blinding speed.

Its four muscled arms slam foes
with powerful punches and chops
at blinding speed.

Its four muscled arms slam foes
with powerful punches and chops
at blinding speed.

La puissance et la rapidité de ses
quatre bras puissants font des
ravages sur ses adversaires.

Its four muscled arms slam foes
with powerful punches and chops
at blinding speed.

La puissance et la rapidité de ses
quatre bras puissants font des
ravages sur ses adversaires.

It uses its four powerful arms to
pin the limbs of its foe, then
throws the victim over the horizon.

It quickly swings its four arms to
rock its opponents with ceaseless
punches and chops from all angles.

Its four muscled arms slam foes
with powerful punches and chops
at blinding speed.

It can knock a train flying with a
punch. However, it is terrible at
delicate work using its fingers.

It punches with its four arms at
blinding speed. It can launch
1,000 punches in two seconds.

Its superpowerful punches are said to
knock the victim flying clear over the
horizon.

Its four ruggedly developed arms can
launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just
two seconds.

It is impossible to defend against punches
and chops doled out by its four arms.
Its fighting spirit flares up when it faces
a tough opponent.

MACHAMP is known as the POKéMON that
has mastered every kind of martial arts.
If it grabs hold of the foe with its four arms, the battle is all but over.
The hapless foe is thrown far over the
horizon.

MACHAMP has the power to hurl anything
aside. However, trying to do any work
requiring care and dexterity causes its arms to get tangled.
This POKéMON tends to leap into action
before it thinks.

With four arms
that react more
quickly than it can think, it can
execute many
punches at once.

It uses its four
powerful arms to
pin the limbs of its foe, then
throws the victim
over the horizon.

It quickly swings
its four arms to
rock its opponents with ceaseless
punches and chops
from all angles.

One arm alone can
move mountains.
Using all four arms, this POKéMON
fires off awesome
punches.

Using its heavy
muscles, it throws
powerful punches that can send the
victim clear over
the horizon.

Using its heavy
muscles, it throws
powerful punches that can send the
victim clear over
the horizon.
